root: ^I'm Detective White, I'm investigating the recent unfortunate events.
^I suppose it's about my father's death?
^I wanted to ask you a few questions if you're up for it.
^I suppose I don't have a choice, do I?

c-0: ^Good day, Mr. Jenkins. I'm Detective White, I'm investigating the recent unfortunate events.
^Hello, Detective. I suppose it's about my father's death?
^Yes, I'm sorry for your loss. I wanted to ask you a few questions if you're up for it.
^I suppose I don't have a choice, do I? Go ahead, ask away.
c-1: ^Your mother mentioned that your relationship with your father was rather strained. Could you tell me more about that?
^Yes, it's true. My father and I didn't see eye to eye.
^He was always stricter with me than my elder brother.
^He never appreciated my interest in chemistry, always saying it's a waste of time.
^He once threw out my chemistry set, saying it was a distraction.
^He often compared me to my elder brother, saying I should be more like him.
^That sounds tough. But your mother also suspects you might have a reason to harm your father.
^I would be a prime suspect, it wouldn't solve my problems.
^And what about your relationship with your elder brother? Your mother said he's closer to you than she is.
^My brother... he's always been there for me.
^Despite our differences, we've managed to maintain a close bond.
^He defended me when father was too harsh, and supported my interests.
^I could never do anything to harm him.
c-2: ^Jonathan, your interest in chemistry has been noted by a few people on board. With your father's death being caused by poisoning, it does raise some questions.
^Could someone have taken your chemicals to poison him?
^I...I never thought of it that way.
^I mean, I do have a variety of chemicals, but I never thought they could be used like that.
^A bottle of cyanide is missing! It's a deadly poison!
^But I didn't give it to anyone! I swear! I don't know how it went missing.
^Could anyone have access to your room and your chemicals?
^I don't lock my room often...So, yes, anyone could have walked in and taken it, but I never thought someone would.
^I thought I was among trustworthy people...I...I didn't think it could lead to this.
